3.6.1.0: [ ^ ] revised the way workshops + fastdl are handled
[ ^ ] few variable names changed to match conformity
3.6.0.0: [ + ] scaling functionality for future addon updates
[ ^ ] removed numerous functions no longer needed
[ ^ ] prepwork to remove deprecated functions in next update
[ % ] fixed steamapi error if customer removes steamapi.cfg file
3.4.1.0: [ ^ ] access module updated for seeking permissions
3.4.0.0: [ + ] added uclass > frame, dspace, insert, pos_table_x, pos_table_y
[ ^ ] timex package now structures a timer id prior to getting / creating the timer
[ ^ ] storage.ent:datafolder( ) now supports param data and data_id in module env file
[ ^ ] marked numerous pieces of code set for deprecation
3.3.0.0: [ + ] added new function to convert string version to table
[ % ] fixed update manager and only announce upon request
[ % ] fixed issue with helper.util:humanbool nil value
3.2.1.0: [ ^ ] updated manifest files for builder-x and arivia v3
3.2.0.0: [ + ] added data manifest.json files for all compatible addons
[ ^ ] updated all compatible addons with new workshop collections
[ ^ ] over 100 internal changes related to speed and security -- only logged for devs
[ ^ ] debug, rnet, etc now output to logs but do not display in console if debugging off
[ - ] repetitive fonts removed from all addon workshops; only in library workshop now
3.1.9.1: [ + ] local func mount_library which now takes over fastdl / font mounting
[ ^ ] tippy now ignores blank tip strings
[ % ] fixed fastdl not syncing fonts properly
3.1.7.0: [ ^ ] tips now fade out if mouse cursor over
[ ^ ] rhook, rnet now have registered count function
[ ^ ] prep for numerous areas of code to be deprecated soon for cleanup
[ % ] xcr was attached to wrong initializing hook
[ - ] deprecated numerous function aliases no longer used
3.1.6.0: [ + ] uclass: onrclick, onmclick, vbar, logic_sl, anim_fadein
[ ^ ] updated rlib to add additional compatibility for upcoming arivia v3
[ ^ ] numerous uclass functions now support gmod pnls and rlib registered pnls
3.1.5.0: [ + ] numerous functions added to be utilized by Arivia
[ % ] uclass mislabeled odc => obc, value_cbox => cbox_val
[ - ] removed various uclass aliases that are now deprecated
3.1.4.0: [ ^ ] modules:require( ) no longer requires 2nd param to retrieve prefix
[ ^ ] rnet data validation enhanced to allow for blank data types to be sent in net request
[ % ] fixed issue with tips getting stuck in rare circumstances
[ - ] removed various uclass aliases that are now deprecated
3.1.3.0: [ + ] new silence enum for msgs / logging
[ ^ ] design.indicator can now support blank materials
[ ^ ] refreshing files with hooks now refreshes hook
[ ^ ] updated code for included ulx modules
[ % ] fixed issue with certain gamemodes halo feature not working (RenderHalos)
3.1.2.0: [ ^ ] uclass ui:ok(), ui:register(), ui:load(), ui:call(), ui:unregister() now utilize registered module env pnl calls
3.1.1.0: [ ^ ] rearranged palias priority order ( Name() => SteamName() )
3.1.0.0: [ + ] new debug system to assist developer with issues
[ ^ ] cleaned console output code with new helper functions
[ ^ ] updated rlib.get:gm() to accept additional parameter (bClean)
[ ^ ] base rlib concommand revised for better command searching
[ ^ ] all concommands are now local and registered
[ ^ ] pco service now -s unused gmod hooks as part of optimization tasks
[ ^ ] pco setting + to cfg.lua to toggle hook removals as part of task list
[ ^ ] migrated all modules over to new versioning system
[ ^ ] set delay on resolution think time
[ ^ ] hooks that cannot be accessed by regular users are now -d
[ ^ ] re-worked rlib help module for easier assistance
3.0.2.0: [ + ] includes/modules/hook.lua - new hook module which optimizes the speed of hook executions
[ ^ ] updated helper.get.id and pmeta associative id funcs to support achievement names
[ ^ ] rlib outdate messages now more visible in console
[ ^ ] enhanced logging structure now places logs in folders categorized by session id
[ % ] fixed issue with sms.umsg causing notifications to display as blank
[ % ] rlib.d now called in client-side rlib file that deals with notifications
3.0.1.0: [ + ] rcore/rlib timers, and hooks + to official calls table
[ ^ ] updated str:isempty to be more accurate
[ ^ ] notifications now have highest zpos priority
[ ^ ] deprecated numerous old funcs no longer needed
[ % ] fixed issue with error occurring if rlib loaded without modules
